title: Navigating Change in the Age of Transformation | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Learn foundational change management principles, strategies, and tools to effectively manage transformation projects, influence stakeholders, and navigate real-world challenges.

Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Navigating Change in the Age of Transformation
Navigating Change in the Age of Transformation
Learn foundational change management principles, strategies, and tools to effectively manage transformation projects, influence stakeholders, and navigate real-world challenges.
Change is happening faster than ever. Are you ready for it?

Every moment in our lives, something changes. Whether it’s in the form of new innovations or global pandemics, change is everywhere. With the pace ever-accelerating, how can individuals thrive in such environments? At the core of every change are people – those driving it and those affected by it.

This course is designed to equip learners with foundational knowledge in change management methodology, behaviours, and tools. It also aligns with the typical lifecycle of transformation projects. Learners will gain a clear understanding of change management, including its objectives and common misconceptions.

Learners will develop the ability to assess the scale and complexity of change by analysing the impact on stakeholders, thereby hereby increasing their influence over the change process. The course further enhances learners' skills in crafting and implementing change strategies using proven change management tools and techniques. This includes addressing potential risks and resistance to ensure the change process is both relevant and effective.

Additionally, learners will draw valuable insights from real-world case studies and experienced change management practitioners. It helps learner to navigate practical challenges and apply best practices to their organisational contexts, ensuring successful and impactful change management.
Higher success in transformation: Lead change initiatives backed by a structured, tailored approach to guide teams and address potential challenges.
Smoother transition: Mitigate risks and minimize disruptions when potential impact to People, Process, or Technology are carefully considered.
More buy-ins: Understanding the unique needs of each individual and addressing them ahead to encourage favorable support from their leadership and stakeholders towards the change.

Individuals and leaders involved in managing and guiding organisational change, including human resource managers, communications leads, organisational development consultants, employee engagement specialists, training and development managers, project or programme managers and transformation managers.
Understand the need for change management and how proper change management reduces the impact of change
Identify stakeholders’ interest, impact and involvement and how to influence them
Connect with your audience through storytelling
How a strong brand creates a positive connection around the change
Build a support network to drive and sustain change initiatives
Design a meaningful change experience  and implement change initiatives to engage and guide people through the transformation journey
Identify the causes of unsuccessful change and strategies to mitigate associated risks
Manage resistance happening at the individual and organisational level
Collaborate with impacted stakeholders to co-create solutions and identify effective approaches for their needs.
Develop a transition strategy towards Business-as-usual
Assess the degree of change adoption to gauge transformation success  and identify specific challenges needing targeted intervention
Leadership and Culture, Strategy Manager, Accenture
Leadership and Culture, Strategy Manager, Accenture

Michael Andree Lee is an experienced leadership and culture consultant with over 19 years of expertise in leadership development, organisational growth and talent management across various industries.
A Certificate of Attainment will be issued to participants who
Attend at least 75% of the course;
Undertake and pass non-credit bearing assessment during the course
Participants who meet the attendance requirement but do not pass the assessment will receive a Certificate of Participation.
The full fee for this course is S$2,725.00.
All fees above include GST. GST applies to individuals and Singapore-registered companies.
Learn more about funding schemes available
There are no upcoming course runs at the moment.

Helping SMEs Embed Sustainability in Business

Co-developed with the Association of Small & Medium Enterprises (ASME), the ‘Introduction to Sustainability for Businesses’ course provides companies with the knowledge and frameworks for mapping their sustainability goals.

Is learning new skills still relevant after 40? This was the question Resendos faced while contemplating taking up a postgraduate certificate course at SIT. His decision to constantly upskill himself shaped his entrepreneurial journey.
Business Management, Design Innovation, Career Growth and Transition
Redefining Thinking and Learning at SkillsFuture Festival

The annual SkillsFuture Festival to promote lifelong learning was hosted by the Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD) this year on 23 July. Riding on the theme of ‘Design for the Future Economy’, the single-day event featured 53 learning workshops and talks, with SIT faculty staff sharing their expert insights on thinking and learning.
Design Innovation, Leadership and Communication, Health Sciences
Lifelong Learning - Upskill with SITizens Learning Credits

To grow professionally, lifelong learning is practically a must when adapting in today’s VUCA world. As a graduate from Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT), how can you make use of the resources on hand to progress in your career?
Business Management, Career Growth and Transition
Agile Orientation for Digital Transformation: Concepts, Practices and Mindsets
Master Agile methodology in this 2-day course. Gain theory, practical skills, and toolkits for real-world implementation and success
Learn mentorship fundamentals and communication skills to foster effective communication and professional growth, empowering mentees.
Green Transformation with Sustainability Excellence Associate (SEA) and B Corp Certification Process
Master sustainable business practices to boost operational performance, focusing on SEA and B Corp certifications for long-term growth and resilience.
Leadership and Communication, Business Management, Sustainability, Energy Efficiency
Learn essential personal branding skills, overcome career stagnation and create impactful content for career advancement.
An executive programme that trains leaders in open source technology, risk management, and innovation, preparing them for Chief Open Source Officer roles.
Business Management, Leadership and Communication, Internet of Things, Executive Education
Certified Practitioner for Lifelong Learning and Competency Development
Master coaching techniques to foster 21st-century skills, resilience, and well-being, while developing effective strategies for personal and professional growth.
